values: Tucker and Steve Bannon Respond to Israel’s War on Iran and How It Could Destroy MAGA Forever

Former Trump chief strategist Steve Bannon on how the president’s enemies are working to destroy MAGA with the war on Iran.



(00:00) Will the Iran War Be the Downfall of MAGA?

(06:55) Fox News’ Pro-War Propaganda

(15:30) Attacks on Anti-War Voices

(29:48) The CIA Is Too Powerful
